about_the_game:
EverWorld is a procedurally generated life sim with deeply simulated artificial intelligence.

- Randomised world - deeply detailed and uniquely generated for you

- NPCs with personality - NPCs that have goals, personality, opinions and memory - they make decisions and talk to each other about real things in the world

- Everything is a thing - if you can see it, it's real and you can interact with it

- Deep simulation - the world progresses whether the player engages or not

- Life simulation - NPCs actually go to work, actually do jobs and fulfil their own day to day wants and needs

- Free text dialogue - say anything to NPCs (current contextual understanding is limited but growing every update - they might not understand everything but they'll try!)

- Dynamic quests - Daily quests plus NPCs will raise their own quest based on real wants and needs

- Dynamic crafting - Discover recipes and use any material with the right properties to craft items

- No loading screens - Building interiors are no different from the world outside
